Plot: He's a 26-year-old loser and his girlfriend just dumped him. But he's got a plan to win her back. He becomes a private eye straight out of a 40's film noir. But now he's in trouble with the cops and the mob. He's Max Anderson, Private Eye.
Title: Max Anderson, Private Eye
Actors: Charles Wetzel Jr., Brittney Forster, Heather Bartlett, Joe Morsher
